name: Sierra Dawn CampSuds Nalgene 118ml
description: Because it is so highly concentrated, only a few drops of Campsuds are needed for most cleaning tasks. The sturdy, leak-proof Nalgene® bottle is reusable.Contains purified water and vegetable-based biodegradable anionic and non-ionic cleaning agents.Effective in hot or cold water – and salt water, too!No animal ingredients or petroleum oils.
